name: 2048 connect: 2 & 2 game
description:
The object of 2048 connect: 2 and 2 game is to connect the numbers by swipe on your phone screen. DON’T run out of moves!

HOW TO PLAY:

1 - Make lines by connecting as many same numbers as you can
2 - Make the line longer, the more points you get
3 - The line will merge all numbers into the big one (eg: 2 and 2 => 4; 4 and 4 and 4 and 4 => 16; 1024 and 1024 make 2048...)

FEATURES

• Endless gameplay, very addictive
• Support boosters to play easier: Drop, Multiply, Divide
• Great graphic design!!!
• 4 themes to unlock
• Support global leaderboard
• Auto save game play

Have fun in 2 connect 2 for 2048 - trending endless puzzle game
